quiz.text: PM SHRI was launched in September, 2022 to showcase the implementation of the National Education Policy (NEP) and emerge as exemplar schools over a period of time, and also offer leadership to other schools in the neighbourhood, what does 'R' stand for in SHRI?
options: Raising
Rising
Resource
Recover
Resilient

quiz.text: Which among the following statement(s) is/are correct about the Scheme - PM SHRI Schools? 1. Tenure of the scheme is 2022-23 to 2026-27, after that responsibility will be of States/UTs to continue to maintain benchmarks achieved. 2. It aims to prepare more than 25,000 exemplar schools in which every student feels welcomed. 3. Existing schools will not be covered under the scheme.
options: 1 and 2
Only 1
1 and 3
Only 3
All of the above

quiz.text: In the first phase of selection of PM SHRI Schools, a total of 6207 schools were selected from 27 States/UTs along with KVS/NVS in which more than 35 lakh students are getting benefitted. Which of the following statement is incorrect in reference to the PM SHRI?
options: (A) Early Childhood Care and Education including Balvatika and Foundational Literacy and Numeracy to be provided.
(B) Maximum 5-schools to be selected per block/ULB with upper limit of number of total schools across India.
(C) Focus on learning outcomes of every child in every grade, assessment at all levels based on conceptual understanding and application of knowledge to real life situations
(D) Linkage with Sector Skill Councils and local industry for enhancing employability and providing better employment opportunities
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Self Reliant India (SRI) Fund ?
options: (A) Objective is to provide funding support to Daughter Funds for onward provision to MSMEs as growth capital, in form of equity or quasi-equity.
(B) Funding to all existing and interested eligible MSMEs which, after assessment.
(C) Non Profit institutions can also avail funding.
(D) National Small Industries Corporation (NSIC) Venture Capital Fund Limited (NVCFL) to act as Mother Fund.
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Under Self Reliant India (SRI) Fund, Govt. of India to be sole anchor investor and provide initial support of _____ to Mother Fund(MF) in phased manner.
options: (A) ₹5,000 crore
(B) ₹10,000 crore
(C) ₹15,000 crore
(D) ₹20,000 crore
(E) ₹50,000 crore

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is correct with respect to Sub-Mission on Agriculture Mechanization (SMAM)?1. It aims to promote Custom Hiring Centres (CHCs) to offset adverse economies of scale arising due to small landholdings and high cost of individual ownership.2. Farm Mechanization programmes implemented through other missions/schemes would continue to be implemented subject to this mission.3. In case of North-Eastern States 80% funding provided by Central Government.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 1 and 3
(C) 2 and 3
(D) Only 1
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to components under Sub-Mission on Agriculture Mechanization (SMAM)?
1. Promotion and Strengthening of Agricultural Mechanization through Training, Testing and Demonstration is Centrally Sponsored component.
2. Demonstration, Training and Distribution of Post Harvest Technology and Management (PHTM) comes under Central Sector component.
3. Promotion of Farm Machinery and Equipment in North-Eastern Region is one of the Centrally Sponsored component.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) Only 1
(C) Only 2
(D) 1 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Sub-Mission on Agriculture Mechanization (SMAM) provides financial Assistance at @ ____ of cost depending on categories of farmers, provided for purchase of agricultural machines.

Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to the Marketing and Logistics Development for Promotion of Tribal Products from North Eastern Region (PTP-NER)? 1. Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Tripura and Ladakh to be covered under the scheme. 2. Its objective is to transform tribal ecosystem by strengthening livelihood opportunities for tribal artisans through enhanced efficiency in procurement, logistics and marketing of products from North-Eastern States. 3. In 1st phase  of the scheme 50 districts covered, while 2nd phase targets  to cover 40 districts.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
Only 1
Only 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: What is the financial allocation for the Marketing and Logistics Development for Promotion of Tribal Products from North Eastern Region (PTP-NER)?
options: Rs 183 Crores
Rs 173 Crores
Rs 163 Crores
Rs 153 Crores
Rs 143 Crores

quiz.text:
Which of the following are acting as partner under Marketing and Logistics Development for Promotion of Tribal Products from North Eastern Region (PTP-NER) scheme?
1. National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD)
2. North Eastern Handicrafts and Handlooms Development Corporation (NEHHDC)
3. India Post 
4. Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
5. North Eastern State Government Departments/ Agencies
options: (A) 1, 2 and 5
(B) 1, 2 and 3
(C) 2, 3 and 5
(D) Only 2 and 5
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect in reference to Marketing and Logistics Development for Promotion of Tribal Products from North Eastern Region (PTP-NER)?
options: (A) Tribal Artisans/ Producers to be empanelled indirectly by organising Tribal Artisan Melas (TAMs)
(B) Van Dhan Vikas Kendra of all N-E States shall be provided market linkages
(C)  Tribal artisans to be facilitated to avail opportunities of enhancing income through provision of backward and forward linkages
(D) Regular Design & Skill Development training sessions tailored to needs of market for tribal recipients to be provided
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Nagar Van Yojana aims to enhance green cover in urban and peri-urban areas including biological diversity, provide ecological benefits and improve quality of life of city dwellers. It targets to develop ___ Nagar Vans and ____ Nagar Vatikas across country during 2020-21 to 2026-27.
options: 300, 200
800, 200
600, 400
400, 200
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Nagar Van Yojana?
options: (A) All cities with Municipal Corporation/ Municipalities/ Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) covered
(B) Nagar Van site can be up to 5 km distance from city limit
(C) Nagar Vatika to be set-up in congested parts  with min 10 ha to max 50 ha within city
(D) Funding to be from National Funds under Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority (CAMPA)
(E) Both B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme?

1. The scheme is implemented by Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas.

2. Migrants are mandatorily required to submit ration cards or address proof.

3. Financial support of Rs.1500 for a connection 14.2kg cylinder.
options: Only 1
Only 2
Only 3
2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with respect to the Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)? 1. Only the BPL ration card will be considered for the purpose of family identification. 2. Aadhar based eKYC is mandatory for enrolment, except in the states of Assam and Meghalaya. 3. In case of no adult female member available, a joint LPG connection can be issued in the name of eldest male family member along with a minor female member of the house.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)?1. Total beneficiaries increased to 12.35 crore in September 2023.2. 75 lakh additional LPG connections to be released in 3 years from 2023-24 to 2025-26.3. It does not provide any subsidy for refill.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) 1 and 2
(D) 2 and 3
(E) All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the Pradhan Mantri JI-VAN (Jaiv Indhan- Vatavaran Anukool fasal awashesh Nivaran) Yojana? 1. Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers' Welfare is acting as Nodal Ministry of the scheme. 2. Centre for High Technology (CHT), is the implementation Agency for the scheme. 3. Gram Sabha is the Nodal body for recommending the beneficiaries/ projects.
options: 1 and 2
Only 2
2 and 3
Only 1
All of the above

quiz.text: In which year was the Pradhan Mantri JI-VAN (Jaiv Indhan- Vatavaran Anukool fasal awashesh Nivaran) Yojana launched?
options: 2015
2017
2019
2020
2021

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to Pradhan Mantri JI-VAN (Jaiv Indhan - Vatavaran Anukool fasal awashesh Nivaran) Yojana?
options: (A) It will provide remunerative income to farmers for their otherwise waste agriculture residues.
(B) Maximum assistance of ₹150 crore per project for commercial projects and ₹15 crore per project for demonstration projects is given
(C) Reducing import dependence by way of substituting fossil fuels with Biofuels is one of the objectives.
(D) It targets to set up 10 commercial scale 2G bioethanol projects.
(E) It will also contribute to Swacch Bharat Mission by supporting aggregation of non-food biofuel feedstocks.

quiz.text: With reference to the distribution of the devices under the above said scheme, which of the following statements are correct?   1. As far as possible, 50% of the beneficiaries in each district shall be women. 2. The devices will be distributed in Camp mode. 3. For the senior citizens aged 75 years or more, the devices are provided at their doorsteps.
options: 1 and 2 only
2 only
2 and 3 only
1 and 3 only
3 only

quiz.text: Under the Scheme, there is no provision to allocate the funds to the State/UT Administrations. Funds are directly released to the ______ under the administrative control of this Ministry, as a sole implementing agency of the Scheme. The implementing agency  will also undertake ____  free maintenance of the aids and assisted living devices.
options: (A) Directorate General of Supplies and Disposals (DGS&D), 1 year
(B) Artificial Limbs Manufacturing Corporation (ALIMCO), 1 year
(C) Artificial Limbs Manufacturing Corporation (ALIMCO), 2 years
(D) Directorate General of Supplies and Disposals (DGS&D), 2 years
(E) Artificial Limbs Manufacturing Corporation (ALIMCO), 3 years

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana?
1. Senior citizens with monthly income not more than ₹10000 are of the target beneficiaries.
2. Loss of teeth is of the disabilities/infirmities covered under Yojana.
3. Responsibility of funding lies with the state governments.
options: (A) 1 and 2
(B) 2 and 3
(C) Only 2
(D) Only 3
(E) 1 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to the Integrated Programme for Senior Citizens (IPSrC)? 1. Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment is the nodal ministry for the scheme. 2. It is a sub-scheme of National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP). 3. Financial assistance is provided to Implementing Agencies such as State / UT Governments / NGOs/ Panchayati Raj Institutions (PRIs) / Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) etc.
options: 1 and 2
1 and 3
2 and 3
Only 1
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is/are Admissible Projects under Integrated Programme for Senior Citizens (IPSrC)? 1. Existing Senior Citizens Homes (SrCH) 2. New Senior Citizen Homes 3. Maintenance of Regional Resource and Training Centres 4. New Mobile Medicare Unit (MMU)
options: Only 2
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3
2, 3 and 4
All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to PM Vishwakarma scheme?
1. In first year, 10 lakh families to be covered and a total of 30 lakh families to be covered over 5 years from FY24 to FY28
2. It aims to strengthen and nurture Guru-Shishya parampara or family-based practice of traditional skills by artisans and craftspeople working with their hands and tools.
3. Support only to artisans and craftspeople of rural areas across India will be provided under the scheme.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) Only 2
(C) Only 3
(D) 1 and 2
(E) All of the above

quiz.text:
PM Vishwakarma’ aims to support traditional artisans and craftspeople, which of the following statement(s) is/are incorrect with respect to PM Vishwakarma scheme?
1. 2 types of skilling programmes - Basic and Advanced and a stipend of ₹500 per day to be provided to beneficiaries while undergoing skill training.
2. Credit Support upto ₹2 lakh (1st Tranche) and ₹3 lakh (2nd Tranche) with a concessional interest rate of 5% to be provided.
3. Total Financial Outlay of the scheme is ₹13,000 crore.
options: (A) Only 1
(B) 1 and 2
(C) Only 2
(D) 2 and 3
(E) None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect eligibility under PM Vishwakarma Scheme?
options: (A) Minimum age should be 21 years on date of registration.
(B) Person should be engaged in trade concerned on date of registration.
(C) Registration and benefits restricted to 1 member of family.
(D) Person in government service and his/her family members is not eligible.
(E) Family defined as consisting of husband, wife and unmarried children.

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme? A. Educational / Training Institutions, SHG and agriculture are eligible for coverage under the scheme. B. The corpus of CGTMSE is being contributed by the GoI and SIDBI in the ratio of 1:1 respectively. C. Fund and non-fund based (Letters of Credit, Bank Guarantee etc.) credit facilities up to Rs 200 lakh per eligible borrower are covered under the guarantee scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the guarantee coverage under the above scheme? A. The extent of guarantee cover is 75% for micro enterprises for credit up to Rs 5 lakh. B. The extent of guarantee cover is 75% of the sanctioned amount of the credit facility for credit above Rs 50 lakh per MSE borrower. C. The extent of guarantee cover is 85% for Micro and Small Enterprises operated and/or owned by women.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which one of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect Vibrant Villages Programme (VVP)? 1. Ministry of Rural Development is the nodal ministry of the Programme. 2. Identification and development of economic drivers based on local natural human and other resources on “Hub and Spoke Model” to be done. 3. VVP can overlap with Border Area Development Programme(BADP).
